title: Trash NZesport Tournament

embed.description: Matches are #red vs #blue where '#' is the group number and 'red' and 'blue' designated match starting sides. E.g. Group 5's Round 1 matches are Team Pixel vs Discos Dongers, Team Arirang vs Valour, The untiltables vs LAW, and Slaydis vs Knock Knock Udyr.

body:
We are team Giga, we have not received any official notice, and were disqualified on the first game day with out playing any game, as you can see in the above link we were in  group 8 , and that's the all the info we know, we know that the first game will be on 20th of OCT, and we were all there ready for the game. however we then been told we have problems with our IGNs???? they want our IGN to be match what has been registered, fair enough then we made our team changed their names back to what was registered, then they go sorry its too late you are disqualified. And we were like OK  we let the first game go, we can try catch up in next few games , because we made mistake. Now is how unsportsmanship comes in the organizer goes : no you are out of the tournament!!! Wow  such a rude organizer.
Also we been told its going to be a NZ based tournament and only NZ teams will join, we found there are numbers of AUS teams in this tournament.
We are so disappointed because they are doing such thing to faithfull LOL player and their team. We were issued auto FF for not checking in, and we havent received any check in info. this is a joke. Please post comment if you suffered the same.

replies.body: So rude lol, Im the player of the team and we have called official admin staff number from 30 min before the game start, and we have told him some of the player have changed their ID, and the staff told us it is alright, and we couldn't received the tournament code and check in, haven't play any game then FF already, fk off bro{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Why would you contact the admin 30 minutes before the first game about name changes?  Shouldn’t you contact them as soon as the name was changed.

Was the contact details that you gave the admins correct? The email you gave them didn’t bounce back if they sent you anything? 

Which staff member told you it was okay. 
Did you get their name?
